title: German Digital Bank N26 to Withdraw From the U.S., Close 500,000 Accounts
sub_head: CEO said in 2019 that N26 could ‘be the leading mobile bank in the U.S.’’
body:
German digital bank N26, at one point Europe’s most valuable fintech startup, said it is discontinuing its operations in the U.S. early next year.
N26, which launched in the U.S. in August of 2019, said it will focus on expanding into new verticals, such as investment products, in the coming year. N26 also said it is eyeing other markets in Eastern Europe and cited growing customer demand there.
